items.sentence: I looked around me to see if anyone was paying any attention to me.
I don\'t want to do what I\'m planning to do, but I have no choice.
Tom and I are just getting ready to eat. Would you like to join us?
Tom and I left right away, but Mary stayed behind to wait for John.
I refuse to believe that we can\'t do anything about the situation.
I still don\'t have enough money to buy the motorcycle that I want.
Stop twisting my words. You know very well that\'s not what I said.
The police didn\'t think it was likely that Tom had killed himself.
When you\'ve finished reading that book, please give it back to me.
Switzerland is situated between France, Italy, Austria and Germany.
